name: itar-compliance
description: ITAR export control compliance for defense articles and technical data
author: Hermetic Labs

card.title: ITAR Compliance
card.description: Export control for defense articles and technical data

summary.overview: ITAR export control compliance with USML classification, export license tracking, foreign person screening, technical data controls, and comprehensive audit reporting.
summary.exampleUseCase: Classify items against USML categories, screen personnel for foreign person status, track export license applications, and generate audit reports for DDTC review.
summary.whatMakesThisDifferent: Local processing ensures controlled technical data never leaves your infrastructure. Integrates with user management for foreign person access controls.
